Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra » Hetu
Suddha
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Hetu
Suddha
303.
1007Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
<< Hetuup Hetusabhāga >>
